title: David Gilmour - Kabuki Fever (26/6/1984 San Francisco, CA, USA)
description:
Bootleg (recorded from a FM broadcast) from a concert in the "About Face" tour by David Gilmour. Plus some bonus tracks

Deep in the Blues - Les Paul Tribute in Brooklyn, New York on 18 August 1988
Ah Robertson, It&#039;s You - performed on Saturday Night Live 12 December 1988
Why Do Fools Fall in Love? 
Walk Like a Man 
Don&#039;t Ask Me 
Big Girls Don&#039;t Cry 
Beautiful Delilah

Above 5 tracks are from Joker&#039;s Wild. This was one of the bands David belonged to before joining Pink Floyd in 1968. These are the only recordings I know of pre-Pink Floyd David Gilmour. In 1965, Joker&#039;s Wild put down 5 tracks on a single-sided mini LP.
